    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>ILMoE</catalog>
            <entry>ILMoE2766</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Please Take Care of my Pet</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Bitte Nehmen-Obacht meines Haustieres</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">S'il vous plaît soin de prise de mon animal de 
compagnie</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Por favor cuidado da tomada de meu animal de 
estimação</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Prego cura dell'introito del mio animale 
domestico</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Παρακαλώ φροντίστε το PET μου</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Por favor cuidado de la toma de mi animal 
doméstico</string>
          </title>
          <language>en</language>
          <description>
            <string language="en">A lesson plan for assesment of a writing activity where students learn to interact socially through the writing of notes , requests or instructions</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">written expression</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">vocabulary</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">social interaction</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">assessment</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Ein Lektionplan für assesment einer Schreiben 
Aktivität, in der Kursteilnehmer erlernen, durch das Schreiben der 
Anmerkungen, der Anträge oder der Anweisungen sozial 
zusammenzuwirken</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Un plan de leçon pour l'assesment d'une activité
d'écriture où les étudiants apprennent à agir l'un sur l'autre 
socialement par l'écriture des notes, des demandes ou des 
instructions</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Uma planta da lição para o assesment de uma 
atividade da escrita onde os estudantes aprendam interagir social com 
a escrita das notas, dos pedidos ou das instruções</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Un programma di lezione per il assesment di 
un'attività di scrittura dove gli allievi imparano interagirsi 
socialmente con la scrittura delle note, delle richieste o delle 
istruzioni</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Ένα σχέδιο μαθήματος για το assesment μιας 
δραστηριότητας γραψίματος όπου οι σπουδαστές μαθαίνουν να 
αλληλεπιδρούν κοινωνικά μέσω του γραψίματος των σημειώσεων, των 
αιτημάτων ή των οδηγιών</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Un plan de la lección para el assesment de una 
actividad de la escritura donde los estudiantes aprenden obrar 
recíprocamente social con la escritura de notas, de peticiones o de 
instrucciones</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">schriftlicher Ausdruck</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Wortschatz</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Sozialinteraktion</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Einschätzung</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>
